column4: just installed 6.06... trying do do a apt-get update, but it can't connect to us.archive.ubuntu.com... is it me or is somethign wrong with the site?  I can't get to it from my browser either.
Apparently the US archives are down for the time being.

It's not really an issue with the Ubuntu operating system, but yes, it's frustrating when you can't apt-get things easily.  You can, however, delete the "us." part from each line in /etc/apt/sources.list to get on your way.
you may choose to replace them later.
